message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. I understand this is a significant investment, so I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.  This is a price I'm confident will be beneficial for both of us. Please consider this carefully and let me know if you're interested. If you decline, I have another buyer lined up, but I believe you would be the ideal partner for this product.
